Not to mention you will use arithmetic in your daily life on a regular basis for the rest of your life.

You will also get to learn the wonders of discovering math. The language of the universe. That in itself makes math so fascinating. Not to mention you will use arithmetic in your daily life on a regular basis for the rest of your life. 
In my opinion and experience, the core subjects are the most important to learn. They are the ones you will use daily in your life and the better at them you are the better off your life
